short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome browser extension hides ads on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing promoted post after promoted post while scrolling on LinkedIn? Download this browser extension to hide ads on LinkedIn. This can improve productivity and decrease distractions, making it easier to focus on networking. 

You can view the source code here: https://github.com/garnetred/hide-linkedin-ads.
